remarks:
Define disjunction ('or') of three wff's.  Definition *2.33 of [WhiteheadRussell] p. 105.  This abbreviation reduces the number of parentheses and emphasizes that the order of bracketing is not important by virtue of the associative law ~ orass .  (Contributed by NM, 8-Apr-1994.) 

---

 Define disjunction ('or') of 3 wff's.  Definition *2.33 of [WhiteheadRussell] p. 105.  This abbreviation reduces the number of parentheses and emphasizes that the order of bracketing is not important by virtue of the associative law ~ orass .  (Contributed by NM, 8-Apr-1994.)
